snippet: The former Niagara coach Joe Mihalich, taking over a men’s team that has just four returnees from a seven-win, turmoil-filled season, is trying to rebuild the program.
abstract: Hofstra's men's basketball coach Joe Mihalich is taking the last remnants of a basketball program that has been gouged by defections, dismissals and one of the worst records in its 77-year history, and is trying to re-build team through trust.
lead_paragraph: The former Niagara coach Joe Mihalich, taking over a men’s team that has just four returnees from a seven-win, turmoil-filled season, is trying to rebuild the program.

headline.main: With Program in Ruins, Coach Builds Trust at Hofstra
headline.print_headline: With Program in Ruins, Coach Builds Trust at Hofstra
